summary: About a tragic love triangle story involving young painter Hye-young, Interpol detective Jeong Woo, and professional hitman Park Yi.
cast: Jun Ji-Hyun|Woo-sung Jung|Sung-Jae Lee|Sara Bernardo Aires|David Chiang|Ho-jin Chun|Dion Lam|Niels Megens|Man-Lung Tang|Maurice Nathan Weert
title: Deiji
